entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • tmp file copy failed the Aot Test #30456
  • dotnet tools occasionally hang #30455
  • SDK 6.0.113 build freezes under source build #30449
  • I have c# please send me solution #30445
  • Workload MSI Tests Are Hard to Write #30419

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, component names display incorrectly when installing workload. #30395

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30457
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30454
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30434
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • READ.ME Includes PR Timeline Guide + Explain Nightly Builds in Documentation #30263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30353
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `exp` prefix in PR to allow better PR review process #30363
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log MSI package ID instead of MSI filename #30420
    Area-Workloads
  • fix repo build on non-ubuntu linux #30379
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.2xx #30234
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30414
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30413
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fixed bug in `CreateTemporaryFolder` counter logic #30359
  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to OSX 12 for 7.0.1xx #30081
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2108647 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.8.0 to 19.9.0 in /eng/dependabot #30355
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • GenAPI: synthesize private fields for value types #30362
    Area-GenAPI
  • Filter out default member attribute for types with indexer. Implement filtering out base type and interfaces. #30394
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30417
    Area-Infrastructure
